name: The Chosen One (kamaleon70)
description:
Game developed for the Dungeon Crawler Jam.

You are a hero chosen to save a small town cursed by continuous attacks by monsters. You have to find the boss and eliminate it.

Use w/s to move forward/backwards - a/d to slide left/right - q/e to rotate anticlockwise and clockwise. z to attack - x to heal - c to cast attack spell. t to take the object in front of you. u to use potions to restore mana. p to open doors if key is available (one room in the dungeon requires a special gold key to be opened).

When spotted by an enemy and during combat the player cannot move until the combat is done.

The game was developed in Godot engine, using Blender for modelling.

The model of the dungeon was made by me in Blender, the particles for fire and spell directly developed by me in Godot (thanks to the video from Miziziziz for the basic instructions on how to do that).
